## RecordType.pick() method

Picks the properties in this record type from the specified source object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pick<S extends Partial<T>>(source: S): Pick<S, keyof T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | S |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
